Title: AN ACT TO REPEAL THE SECOND PARAGRAPH OF ARTICLE FIFTY-ONE OF THE CODE OF COMMERCE
Data:
[ Act No. 3098, March 16, 1923 ]
AN ACT TO REPEAL THE SECOND PARAGRAPH OF ARTICLE FIFTY-ONE OF THE CODE OF COMMERCE
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The second paragraph of article fifty-one of the Code of Commerce is hereby repealed.ℒαwρhi৷
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, March 16, 1923.
